Plot: A computer programmer's dream job at a hot Portland-based firm turns nightmarish when he discovers his boss has a secret and ruthless means of dispatching anti-trust problems.
Title: Antitrust
Actors: Ryan Phillippe, Rachael Leigh Cook, Claire Forlani, Tim Robbins
tomatoConsensus: Due to its use of cliched and ludicrous plot devices, this thriller is more predictable than suspenseful. Also, the acting is bad.
